くそっ、倒しても倒してもキリがないな……！\n近くに巣でもあるんじゃないのか！？:
Dammit, there's no end to it no matter how many I defeat...!
Isn't there a nest nearby?!
はぁっ……はぁっ……この、雑魚のくせに……！\n数さえ少なければ、こんなやつらな:
Haah... haah... You're such a small fry...!
If only there weren't so many of them...!
武装のない霞光じゃまともな援護もできない。\nくそ、やっぱり機体を乗り換えるべき:
Kasumi Hikaru, who had no weapons, couldn't provide proper support.
Damn it, I should've switched planes after all...
（敵の包囲はどんどん厚くなってきている。\nこのまま……いや、状況が悪化していけ:
(The enemy’s encirclement is getting thicker and thicker.
At this rate... No, if the situation gets worse, breaking through will be hopeless.)
める達は……無事に包囲を抜けたみたいだな。: Looks like Meguru and the others made it through the siege without incident.
次は俺達の番だ！\nお前も、最後の瞬間まで諦めるなよ！:
Now it's our turn!
Don’t give up until the very last moment, either!
ラミはそもそも最初から諦めてないっつの！: Rami never gave up in the first place!
俺も、俺のやるべきことをやらないとな。: I need to do what I have to do, too.
霞光が原形をとどめなくなったって構わない。\n俺は指揮官として、ラミを絶対に地上:
I don't care if Kasumi Hikaru no longer retains her original form.
As a commander, I'll definitely escort Rami to the surface...!
弾を残す必要はない。ありったけをぶっ放せ！: There's no need to leave any bullets behind. Let's go all out!
言われなくたって、すでにそのつもりだよ！: You don't have to tell me! I'm already planning on doing that!
ぐっ……！ くそっ、馬鹿の一つ覚えみたいに\n突っ込んできやがって……！:
Ugh...! Dammit, it’s like I’m remembering one stupid thing.
He's charging in...!
俺のことは気にするな！ 自分のことだけ考えろ！: Don't worry about me! Just think about yourself!
そんなこと言われても……も、もう、これ以上は……！: Even if you say that... I-I can't take any more...!
っ！？ ラミ、正面からきてるぞ！ 逃げろ！: !? Rami, it's coming from the front! Run!
これは……何者かによる、攻撃……？\n待て、このレーダーの反応は……？:
Is this... an attack by someone...?
Wait, what's this radar reading...?
ひ、ひぇええええ！ な、なんですかこの数！？\n夢に出てきちゃいますよ～！:
E-Eeeeeeeek! Wh-What's with all these numbers?!
It's going to appear in my dreams!
ふん。いつも偉そうなくせして、なんて情けない姿をさらしてんのよ。\nそれでも私達:
Hmph. You're always acting all high and mighty. How pathetic.
So you're still a member of Sirius Sugar who beat us?
翻訳すると、『生きててくれて、良かった』かしら？: To translate, “I’m glad you’re alive,” I guess?
舞亜さん、そんなこと言ったら、\nまたクララさんに逆ギレされるわよ？:
Maia, if you say that...
Clara's gonna piss you off again, you know?
お前達、今は作戦行動中だ。私語は慎むように。: Guys, we're in the middle of an operation right now. Don't talk to me.
探索計画の予定帰還時刻を超過しても戻ってこなかったからな。\n助けに来たぞ。:
They didn't come back even after the planned return time for the exploration plan.
I'm here to save you.
フッ……それとも、もう少し遅かった方が良かったか？: Heh... Or should I have been a little later?
あ、あの……オープン回線だったので、全部聞こえてました……: U-Umm... It was an open line, so I could hear everything...
老後の話までしてたわよね。少し気が早すぎると思うけど。: You were even talking about old age, weren't you? I think you're a little too hasty.
この先に安全地帯がある。そこから<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>の安全ルート: There's a safe zone up ahead. From there, we should be able to get to the safe route of the <r-cave belt>, the underground zone. Go on ahead, we'll take care of the rest.
ああ、脱出の援護を頼む！！: Yeah, I'm counting on you to cover the escape!!
――それから俺達はカラフルブーケに敵の掃討を任せ、\n<r=プライマル・ベルト>:
—After that, we left cleaning up the enemy to the colorful bouquet
They had come to the safety of the <r-primal belt> Primogenitor belt.
気が抜けて外の空気を吸いたくなり、俺とラミは機体から外に出た。\n今頃、一足早く:
Feeling drained and eager to get some fresh air, Rami and I exit the aircraft.
By now, the aircraft of Shichika and the others should be heading for the surface as soon as possible.
もちろん、少しだけ休んだら、自分達も後を追うつもりだ。: Of course, once they rested a little, they planned to follow after them.
こっちこそ: I should be the one saying that.
そういや、お前と付き合うって話についてなんだが……: Come to think of it, I was talking about going out with you...
いや、今更言わなくても、分かってるよ。\nラミ達の仲間割れを止めるためのタチの悪:
No, you don't have to say it now. I know.
It's a nasty joke to stop the lamies from breaking up, isn't it?
カラブのみんなに聞かれてたのは、恥ずかしかったけど。: It was embarrassing for everyone in the caravan to hear that, though.
まーあ？ 乙女の純情をもてあそんだ罪は、\nしっかり償ってもらうけどね～？:
Maaaaan? The sin of toying with a maiden’s pure heart...
I'll make sure you make up for it, okay?
じゃあ、今度ステーキハウスにでも連れてってもらおっかな。: Well, maybe I'll have her take me to the steakhouse sometime.
もちろん、ふたりでね♪: Just the two of us, of course♪
